name: Velvet Lounge Chair with Walnut Plinth
description: The Velvet Chair with Walnut Plinth showcases masterful design and maximum comfort. Combining unexpected, rounded shapes with sumptuous velvet. The plush chair appears to float on the walnut plinth adding a delicacy to the piece. Upholstered in a rich camel velvet, the natural brown hue is designed to create an inviting sense of warmth whilst grounded in nature. The tactile velvet enhances the comfy lines of this contemporary lounge chair. Our makers use the best quality foam padding to achieve a plush rounded form, striking a cohesive balance of style and comfort.
